main event: An unidentified flying object (UFO) was observed in the sky over San Marcos, Texas on August 8, 1954 at approximately 8:45 PM.
interesting points: The object was first sighted near the horizon and appeared to be moving slowly across the sky.
The object was reported to be disk-shaped and emitting a bright reddish-orange glow.
As the object approached the witnesses' location, it increased in speed and brightness.
At one point, the object took a very sharp 90-degree turn and continued on a straight course, then turned back into its original flight path and crossed over the witnesses before disappearing.
The sighting was reported by two teenage witnesses.
sighted object: a disk-shaped object emitting a bright reddish-orange glow
photographs: no, the report does not mention any photographs
